example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS قالت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3FS ها)) (ADJP-PRD (PUNC ") (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM بريئة) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC تماما)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تهم) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اذاعة) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN انباء)) (SBAR (-NONE- *ICH*-1)))) (NP-LOC (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC داخل) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN الاردن))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC خارج) (NP (PRON_3MS ه))))

arg.g: of the charges of broadcasting news inside and outside Jordan

example.arg: من تهم اذاعة انباء داخل الاردن وخارجه
